snippet: As Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey heads for what is expected to be an easy re-election, he is building an operation that could form the basis for a presidential run.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie is quietly building a sophisticated political operation that could become the basis for a national campaign, even as he heads for what is expected to be an easy re-election; Christie's aides say that their focus is his re-election effort and that they hope it will offer a model for Republicans in the years ahead.
lead_paragraph: As Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey heads for what is expected to be an easy re-election, he is building an operation that could form the basis for a presidential run.

headline.main: Christie’s Re-election Engine Gets in Gear for a Bigger Race
headline.print_headline: Christie’s Re-election Engine Gets in Gear for a Bigger Race
